alert.note: Alert for Aransas Islands; Coastal Aransas; Coastal San Patricio; Nueces Islands (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 05 at 9:51AM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Aransas, east central Nueces and southeastern San Patricio Counties through 1030 AM CDT... At 951 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Aransas Pass, or 8 miles northeast of Portland, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Port Aransas, Ingleside, Aransas Pass, Ingleside On The Bay and Palm Harbor. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Aransas Islands; Coastal Aransas; Coastal San Patricio; Nueces Islands
